metaface.interaction
Class DMTLTagReader

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      metaface.interaction.DMTLTagReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler
public class DMTLTagReader
extends DefaultHandler

This class contains the callback routines neccessary to read DMTL into memory (KnowledgeBase). This format is then used by the InteractionManager. DMTL is defined by the following DMTL structure:

See the DMTL DTD or and example file.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Simon Beard
See Also:
InteractionManager, DMTLParser, KnowledgeBase
